**Tender Announcement: Landscape Maintenance Services, Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP)**

### Reference Information
* **Reference number**: 5P300-23-0545/A
* **Closing date**: May 22, 2024, 2:00 pm EDT
* **Contract duration**: June 1, 2024, to April 30, 2026

### Tender Overview
Parks Canada is seeking a experienced contractor to provide landscape maintenance services at Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP). The successful bidder will be responsible for mowing, trimming, and maintaining grassy areas around the park. The contract term includes an option to extend for three (3) additional one (1) year periods.

### Bid Submission Guidelines
* Bids may be submitted by email to soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca or by fax to 1-877-558-2349.
* All bid documents must be submitted in electronic format, as emails containing links to bid documents are not accepted.
* The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring their bid documents are complete and accurate.

### Site Visit and Enquiries
A site visit is recommended to familiarize bidders with the work location. The visit will take place on May 6, 2024, at 7450 Kingston Road, Toronto. Bidders must confirm their attendance by May 3, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT.

Enquiries regarding this solicitation may be submitted in writing and must be received no later than five (5) business days prior to the closing date. Bidders are advised to carefully review the solicitation documents for all information and requirements.

### Important Details
* National Parks Regulations require all work to be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
